hiringPattern.pattern: Real-world problem solving and system architectural design.

questions.title: Real-time Order Tracking System
questions.description: Design a system to track thousands of delivery partners in real-time and provide accurate ETAs to customers.

questions.title: Shortest Path in Delivery Network
questions.description: Given a map of delivery locations and path costs, find the shortest path for a partner to deliver multiple orders.

questions.title: Caching Strategies for High Traffic
questions.description: How would you handle a sudden spike in traffic during a major sporting event (e.g., IPL)? Discuss caching and rate limiting.
